patthana13.6:5.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:5.2: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:5.3: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:5.4: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro ca naavitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:5.5: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto ca naavitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:5.6: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro ca naavitakkavicāramatto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:5.7: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro ca naavitakkavicāramatto ca naavitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #7
patthana13.6:6.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:6.2: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:6.3: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:6.4: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro ca naavitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:6.5: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto ca naavitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:6.6: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro ca naavitakkavicāramatto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.6:6.7: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro ca naavitakkavicāramatto ca naavitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #7
patthana13.6:7.1: Avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana13.6:8.1: Savitakkasavicārañca avitakkaavicārañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana13.6:9.1: Avitakkavicāramattañca avitakkaavicārañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana13.6:10.1: Savitakkasavicārañca avitakkavicāramattañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana13.6:11.1: Savitakkasavicārañca avitakkavicāramattañca avitakkaavicārañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana13.6:12.1: Hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa, ārammaṇe ekūnapaññāsa, adhipatiyā bāttiṃsa … pe … purejāte āsevane pañcavīsa … pe … avigate ekūnapaññāsa.
